thread.title: Kanye West Auditioned For "American Idol" and Kim Kardashian Was There to Support Him
thread.title_full: Kanye West Auditioned For "American Idol" and Kim Kardashian Was There to Support Him

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Kanye West Auditioned For "American Idol" and Kim Kardashian Was There to Support Him
text:
The self-proclaimed "greatest living rock star" showed American Idol hopefuls how it's done, after he popped by to surprise the judges. Kanye West delighted Jennifer Lopez, Keith Urban and Harry Connick Jr when he auditioned at their San Francisco stop on Saturday (October 10).
Share Tweet Pin E-mail It looks like the rapper made it through the next round and is headed to Hollywood. Host Ryan Seacrest, who produces Keeping Up with the Kardashians , posted on his Instagram an image of Kanye holding his Hollywood ticket, with pregnant wife Kim Kardashian waiting for him. Kanye and Kim, who already have 2-year-old daughter North, are expecting their second child .
look who's going to Hollywood! #IdolAuditions #kanyewest
A photo posted by Ryan Seacrest (@ryanseacrest) on Oct 10, 2015 at 5:49pm PDT
More From Cosmopolitan Kim also posted an Instagram picture of Kanye's audition from a monitor, with a glimpse of Lopez and Connick's reactions.
SURPRISE!
A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Oct 10, 2015 at 6:12pm PDT
Fox announced in May that it will be cancelling American Idol after its 15th season .
American Idol will return in January 2016.
